title: Road Bike
description: A high-performance road bike suitable for long-distance cycling and racing. Features lightweight frame and aerodynamic design.

title: Mountain Bike
description: Durable mountain bike built for off-road trails and rugged terrain. Equipped with suspension and sturdy tires.

title: Hybrid Bike
description: Versatile hybrid bike ideal for both city commuting and light trail riding. Combines features of road and mountain bikes.

title: Cycling Helmet
description: Safety-certified helmet designed to protect your head during cycling. Features adjustable fit and ventilation system.

title: Cycling Gloves
description: Comfortable and padded gloves to enhance grip and reduce hand fatigue. Available in various sizes and styles.

title: Water Bottle
description: BPA-free water bottle with a secure cap and easy-to-use nozzle. Keeps you hydrated during long rides.
